page.title: 19AROUND CROY
page.content: Driving up the Manse Brae north of Croy the first building you will pass on your right is the Minister's house,further along is the Barn Hall and the Church.At the side of the Church lies the Croy farm where they have cows, sheep and vegetables. Set in the centre of Croy is the Croy Primary School and scattered around are twenty three council houses.Driving up the brae into ArdCroy you would pass the village shop.In ArdCroy Road you would see seventy six council houses and around fifteen private houses. Moving along to the end of the south road you would pass a big potato shed. After passing through the village you will pass the last building which is the village Hall which is to the east of the village on the road to Nairn and Cawdor.
